Welcome to Onzzer’s documentation!¶

Onzzer is a Python program. It use PyQt5 library to work. This application uses the Music-search database. It allows to retrieve the titles of an album from its name. A recording function is available. This function saves the list of titles in text format.

Note

Find our github in this link
